item.title: 中国和越南考虑修建穿越稀土中心地带的铁路
item.description:
Summary:
  • China's foreign minister visits Hanoi amid plans for Xi's trip
  • Upgraded rail link would connect China to Haiphong
  • China is top investor in Vietnam despite maritime tensions
翻译:概括：
  • 中国外交部长在习近平访问河内的计划中访问
  • 升级后的铁路线将连接中国和海防
  • 尽管海上局势紧张，中国仍是越南最大投资者

China and Vietnam are working on a possible significant upgrade of their underdeveloped rail links to boost a line that crosses Vietnam's rare earths heartland and reaches the country's top port in the north, senior officials and diplomats said.翻译:高级官员和外交官表示，中国和越南正在努力对其欠发达的铁路线进行可能的重大升级，以加强一条穿越越南稀土中心地带并到达该国北部主要港口的线路。

The talks are part of preparations for a possible visit to Hanoi in coming weeks by Chinese President Xi Jinping, officials and diplomats said, which would further confirm Vietnam's increasingly strategic role in global supply chains as major powers including the United States vie to gain influence there.翻译:官员和外交官表示，这些会谈是中国国家主席习近平未来几周可能访问河内的准备工作的一部分，这将进一步证实越南在全球供应链中日益重要的战略作用，因为包括美国在内的主要大国都在争夺在那里的影响力。

Deeper trade ties and railways connections are expected to be discussed on Friday as China's top diplomat Wang Yi meets Vietnam's Deputy Prime Minister Tran Luu Quang in Hanoi, diplomats said.翻译:外交官们表示，中国最高外交官王毅将于周五在河内会见越南副总理陈柳光，预计将讨论更深层次的贸易关系和铁路连接问题。

Vietnamese Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh called for the upgrade of the railway linking Kunming in southern China to Vietnam's port city of Haiphong in a statement released last month, after China's Commerce Minister Wang Wentao made a rare visit to Vietnam.翻译:在中国商务部长王文涛罕见访问越南后，越南总理范明正在上个月发表的一份声明中呼吁升级连接中国南部昆明和越南港口城市海防的铁路。

Chinese officials have stressed the importance of boosting infrastructure connectivity with their southern neighbour.翻译:中国官员强调了加强与南方邻国基础设施互联互通的重要性。

Vietnam has already rail connections to China, but the system is old with limited capacity on the Vietnam side. The two systems are also not interoperable at the moment, meaning trains have to stop at the border where passengers and goods are transferred to domestic services.翻译:越南已经与中国建立了铁路连接，但系统陈旧，越南一侧的运力有限。目前，这两个系统还无法互操作，这意味着火车必须在边境停靠，乘客和货物才能转乘国内服务。

The upgraded railway would pass through the region where Vietnam has its largest deposits of rare earths, of which China is by far the world's biggest refiner.翻译:升级后的铁路将穿过越南拥有最大稀土矿藏的地区，而中国是迄今为止世界上最大的稀土精炼国。

Vietnam is trying to build its own industry in what is seen as a possible challenge to China's dominance, but what appear as internal fights have cast a shadow over these efforts.翻译:越南正试图建立自己的工业，这被视为可能挑战中国的主导地位，但看似内部的斗争给这些努力蒙上了阴影。

Chinese and Vietnamese rare earths industry experts discussed last week stronger cooperation on processing the minerals, according to Vietnamese state media.翻译:据越南官方媒体报道，中国和越南稀土行业专家上周讨论了在矿物加工方面加强合作。

It is unclear how much China would contribute to the upgraded railway track in Vietnam and whether Hanoi would accept sizeable financing from Beijing on this.翻译:目前尚不清楚中国将为越南铁路升级改造贡献多少资金，以及河内是否会接受北京方面的巨额融资。

The line could be seen as part of China's flagship Belt and Road Initiative (BRI) which is supporting infrastructure investment across the world, but is not clear whether it would be labelled as a BRI project, one diplomat said.翻译:一位外交官表示，该线路可以被视为中国旗舰“一带一路”倡议的一部分，该倡议正在支持全球基础设施投资，但尚不清楚它是否会被标记为“一带一路”项目。

A strengthened railway link could also boost Vietnam's export to China, mostly of agriculture products, boost Chinese tourism to northern Vietnam and further integrate the two countries' manufacturing industries, which experts already consider as symbiotic, with factories in Vietnam largely assembling components produced in China.翻译:加强铁路连接还可以促进越南对中国的出口，主要是农产品，促进中国对越南北部的旅游业，并进一步整合两国的制造业，专家已经认为这是共生的，越南的工厂主要组装中国生产的零部件。

China is Vietnam's largest trading partner and so far this year is also the main investor, taking into account investment from Hong Kong, as many Chinese companies move south some of their operations amid trade tensions between Beijing and Washington.翻译:中国是越南最大的贸易伙伴，考虑到来自香港的投资，今年迄今为止也是主要投资者，因为许多中国公司在北京和华盛顿之间的贸易紧张局势中将部分业务南迁。

Despite the booming economic links, the two communist nations are embroiled in a years-long maritime dispute in the South China Sea and fought a brief war in the late 70s, China's latest.翻译:尽管经济联系蓬勃发展，但这两个共产主义国家却在南海卷入了长达数年的海上争端，并在上世纪七十年代末爆发了一场短暂的战争，这是中国最近的一次战争。

Reporting Francesco Guarascio and Khanh Vu; additional reporting by Phuong Nguyen; Editing by Stephen Coates翻译:报道 Francesco Guarascio 和 Khanh Vu； Phuong Nguyen 的补充报告；斯蒂芬·科茨编辑

item.title: 独家：中国在选举前以廉价旅行吸引数百名台湾政客
item.description:
Beijing has sponsored cut-price trips to China for hundreds of Taiwanese politicians ahead of key elections on the island, according to Taiwan sources and documents, unnerving officials with a broad campaign that one called "election interference".翻译:据台湾消息人士和文件称，北京在岛上的重大选举之前赞助了数百名台湾政界人士前往中国大陆的低价旅行，这场被称为“选举干预”的广泛活动让官员们感到不安。

President Tsai Ing-wen and other Taiwan officials have warned that China might try to sway voters toward candidates seeking closer ties with Beijing in the elections, which could define the island's relations with China. But the scale of the Chinese activity has not previously been reported.翻译:总统蔡英文和其他台湾官员警告说，中国可能会试图在选举中引导选民支持那些寻求与北京建立更密切关系的候选人，这可能会决定台湾与中国的关系。但此前并未报道过中国活动的规模。

Beijing, which claims democratically governed Taiwan as its own and has ramped up military and political pressure to force the island to accept its sovereignty, frames the Jan. 13 presidential and legislative elections as a choice between "peace and war", calling the ruling party dangerous separatists and urging Taiwanese to make the "right choice".翻译:北京声称对台湾实行民主治理，并加大了军事和政治压力，迫使台湾接受其主权，将1月13日的总统选举和立法院选举视为“和平与战争”之间的选择，并称执政党危险的分裂分子并敦促台湾人做出“正确的选择”。

Taiwanese law forbids election campaigns from receiving money from "external hostile forces", including China, and prosecutors in southern Taiwan this week said they were investigating 22 people, including grassroots politicians, for potential violations of election and security laws.翻译:台湾法律禁止竞选活动接受来自包括中国在内的“外部敌对势力”的资金，台湾南部检察官本周表示，他们正在调查包括草根政客在内的 22 人，涉嫌违反选举法和安全法。

Across Taiwan security agencies are looking into more than 400 visits to China in the past month, most led by local opinion leaders such as borough chiefs and village heads, a Taiwan security official looking into China's activities told Reuters.翻译:一名调查中国活动的台湾安全官员告诉路透社，过去一个月，台湾各地的安全机构正在调查 400 多次对中国的访问，其中大多数是由当地意见领袖（例如区长和村长）领导的。

The agencies believe the trips, with discounted accommodations, transportation and meals, were subsidised by units under China's Taiwan Affairs Office, said the person, who requested anonymity due to the sensitivity of the matter.翻译:该人士表示，这些机构认为，这些住宿、交通和餐饮折扣的旅行是由中国台湾事务办公室下属单位提供补贴的。由于此事敏感，该人士要求匿名。

The Chinese office did not respond to a request for comment. It has previously said it respects Taiwan's "social systems" when commenting on the elections.翻译:中国办公室没有回应置评请求。它此前曾表示在评论选举时尊重台湾的“社会制度”。

Asked for comment, Taiwan's Mainland Affairs Council, the top China-policy body, referred Reuters to comments this week by its minister, Chiu Tai-san. He said it was "self-evident" Beijing was trying to sway Taiwan elections through means including free trips for politicians.翻译:在被要求置评时，台湾最高的中国政策机构陆委会向路透社转介了其部长邱大山本周的评论。他表示，北京正试图通过政客免费旅行等手段影响台湾选举，这是“不言而喻的”。

"They have already made it clear that a so-called 'right choice' has to be made, meaning choosing candidates that the Chinese Communist Party prefers," he told reporters without elaborating.

'ELECTION INTERFERENCE'

People taking these trips typically pay their own airfare, but other expenses are offered by Chinese authorities, officials looking into the matter said.翻译:调查此事的官员表示，参加这些旅行的人通常自己支付机票费用，但其他费用由中国当局提供。

"Election interference has started under the name of group tours," said a second Taiwan security official, who was briefed on the matter, adding Beijing was targeting politicians crucial to the island's administrative systems who play key roles in shaping public opinion.翻译:另一位获悉此事的台湾安全官员表示：“选举干扰是以团体旅游的名义开始的。”他补充说，北京的目标是对台湾行政系统至关重要的政客，他们在塑造公众舆论方面发挥着关键作用。

More than 300 borough chiefs or village heads from populous central Taiwan alone have participated in such trips to China in the past few months, this person said.翻译:这位人士表示，过去几个月，仅人口稠密的台湾中部就有 300 多名区长或村长参加了此类中国之行。

More than 20 borough chiefs from a district of the capital Taipei joined a China-sponsored trip to Shanghai with their families in September, while more than 10 people from an association for local politicians in neighbouring New Taipei City joined a trip this week, according to two security reports reviewed by Reuters.翻译:据报道，9月份，来自首都台北一个区的20多名区长与家人一起参加了中国赞助的上海之旅，而邻近的新北市地方政治家协会的10多名人士本周也参加了一次旅行。路透社审阅了两份安全报告。

The number from the Taipei district has "increased significantly" compared with elections four years ago and registrations have been "fairly enthusiastic", one report said. "Certain borough chiefs have become the window of contacts in Taiwan for some Chinese units."翻译:一份报告称，与四年前的选举相比，台北选区的人数“显着增加”，登记“相当热情”。 “某些区长已成为一些中方单位在台的联络窗口。”

So far this year, more than 1,000 borough chiefs or village heads joined such trips, more than last time, the second official said, adding China was targeting electoral districts where support was strong for candidates campaigning for closer China ties.

HARD TO BUILD A LEGAL CASE

In the investigation in the southern city of Kaohsiung, prosecutors said they believed the five trips from there were fully funded by China's Taiwan Affairs Office.翻译:在南部城市高雄的调查中，检察官表示，他们相信从那里出发的五次旅行完全由中国台湾事务办公室资助。

Chinese officials allegedly asked participants to support certain political parties and "oppose Taiwan independence", the prosecutors said in a statement.翻译:检察官在一份声明中表示，据称中国官员要求参与者支持某些政党并“反对台独”。

"There is no such thing as a free lunch," Prosecutor-General Hsing Tai-chao said on Thursday. He said external forces were trying to influence citizens in an "unprecedented fashion" and urged Taiwanese not to accept perks or instructions from Chinese authorities when travelling there.翻译:“天下没有免费的午餐，”检察长邢台超周四表示。他表示，外部势力正试图以“前所未有的方式”影响公民，并敦促台湾人在台湾旅行时不要接受中国当局的福利或指示。

Building criminal cases against trip-takers is challenging, security officials said, because it can be hard to establish a money trail to Chinese state agencies behind the tours, which often come much below going market rate, and to establish what was said during meetings with Chinese officials.翻译:安全官员表示，对旅游者提起刑事诉讼具有挑战性，因为很难确定旅游背后的中国国家机构的资金来源（这些资金往往远低于市场价格），也很难确定在与旅游团的会面中所说的内容。中国官员。

Taiwan suspended group tours to China via travel agencies after the COVID-19 pandemic, but there are no restrictions on individuals visiting.翻译:COVID-19 大流行后，台湾暂停了通过旅行社前往中国的团体旅游，但对个人访问没有限制。

Recent government scrutiny has prompted some politicians to be more low-key about such trips, the two officials said, with some making arrangements separately, then gathering in China.翻译:两位官员表示，最近政府的审查促使一些政界人士对此类访问更加低调，其中一些人分别做出安排，然后聚集在中国。

"They now even avoid sitting in seats next to one another during their flight."翻译:“他们现在甚至避免在飞行过程中坐在彼此相邻的座位上。”

Reporting By Yimou Lee; Additional reporting by Ben Blanchard; Editing by William Mallard翻译:李艺谋报道；本·布兰查德 (Ben Blanchard) 的补充报道；威廉·马拉德编辑

item.title: 亚洲工厂活动减弱，中国的不确定性给前景蒙上阴影
item.description:
Summary:
  • China's private PMI unexpectedly expands in November
  • Manufacturing activity slumps in Japan, steadies in S. Korea
  • Soft global demand clouds outlook for Asia's fragile recovery
翻译:概括：
  • 11月中国民间PMI意外扩大
  • 日本制造业活动下滑，韩国制造业活动稳定
  • 全球需求疲软给亚洲脆弱的复苏前景蒙上阴影

Asia's factory activity remained weak in November on soft global demand, surveys showed on Friday, with mixed signs on the strength of China's economy clouding the outlook for the region's fragile recovery.翻译:周五的调查显示，由于全球需求疲软，亚洲 11 月份工厂活动依然疲软，中国经济实力的好坏参半的迹象给该地区脆弱的复苏前景蒙上阴影。

China's private Caixin/S&P Global manufacturing purchasing managers' index (PMI) unexpectedly rose to 50.7 in November from a 49.5 reading in October, exceeding the 50 mark separating growth from contraction and surpassing analysts' forecasts.翻译:中国私营企业财新/标普全球制造业采购经理人指数(PMI)意外从10月份的49.5升至11月份的50.7，突破了增长与收缩的50大关，并超出了分析师的预期。

The reading came a day after official survey that showed a contraction in both manufacturers' and non-manufacturers' activity, underscoring deepening troubles in the world's second largest economy.翻译:该数据发布前一天， 官方调查显示制造商和非制造商活动均出现萎缩，突显出世界第二大经济体的问题日益加深。

"The domestic market cannot make up for losses in Europe and the United States. The data shows that factories are producing less and hiring fewer people," Dan Wang, chief economist at Hang Seng Bank China, said of China's PMI readings, which have different samples.翻译:恒生银行中国区首席经济学家王丹在谈到中国​​的PMI数据时表示：“国内市场无法弥补欧洲和美国的损失。数据显示工厂生产减少，雇用人员减少。”样品。

Export-reliant Japan, South Korea and Taiwan bore the brunt of sluggish global demand with their manufacturing activity remaining stagnant in November, surveys showed.翻译:调查显示，依赖出口的日本、韩国和台湾首当其冲地受到全球需求低迷的影响，11 月份这些国家的制造业活动仍然停滞不前。

"It's hard to expect a recovery in Asia any time soon," said Toru Nishihama, chief emerging market economist at Dai-ichi Life Research Institute. "While exports probably hit bottom, they won't accelerate much from here as the global economy lacks a key driver of growth."翻译:第一生命研究所首席新兴市场经济学家西滨彻表示：“很难指望亚洲很快就会复苏。” “虽然出口可能触底，但由于全球经济缺乏关键增长动力，出口不会因此大幅加速。”

Japan's final au Jibun Bank manufacturing PMI fell to 48.3 in November from 48.7 in October, shrinking at the fastest pace in nine months.翻译:日本11月自分银行制造业PMI终值从10月的48.7降至48.3，为九个月来最快的萎缩速度。

South Korea's PMI stood at 50.0 in November, rising slightly from October's reading of 49.8. The factory gauge rebound came after 16 straight months of contraction through October, the longest downturn since the survey began in April 2004.翻译:韩国 11 月份 PMI 为 50.0，较 10 月份的 49.8 略有上升。工厂指标在截至 10 月份连续 16 个月收缩之后出现反弹，这是自 2004 年 4 月开始调查以来最长的低迷时期。

Manufacturing activity also shrank in Taiwan, Vietnam and Malaysia, but expanded in India, Indonesia and the Philippines, the surveys showed.翻译:调查显示，台湾、越南和马来西亚的制造业活动也出现萎缩，但印度、印度尼西亚和菲律宾的制造业活动有所增加。

China's economy has struggled this year to mount a strong post-pandemic recovery, adding gloom to an already darkening global outlook as U.S. and European economies begin to feel the pinch from past aggressive interest rate hikes.翻译:今年，中国经济在疫情后难以实现强劲复苏，随着美国和欧洲经济开始感受到过去大幅加息的压力，这给本已黯淡的全球前景增添了一丝阴霾。

"The weakness in China's service sector is particularly worrying, as it shows demand is evaporating even as supply picks up," Nishihama of Dai-ichi Life Research Institute said.翻译:第一生命研究所的西滨表示：“中国服务业的疲软尤其令人担忧，因为这表明即使供应增加，需求也在蒸发。”

In India, the PMI survey released on Friday showed the country's manufacturing growth accelerated in November on robust output and new orders.翻译:印度周五公布的 PMI 调查显示，由于强劲的产出和新订单，该国 11 月份制造业增长加速。

While domestic demand appeared strong, international demand took a hit, with new export orders at a five-month low.翻译:尽管国内需求强劲，但国际需求受到打击，新出口订单创五个月新低。

Reporting by Leika Kihara; Editing by Jamie Freed翻译:木原莱卡报道；杰米·弗里德编辑

item.title: 调查显示，11月份中国新建住宅价格连续第三个月上涨
item.description:
China's new home prices rose slightly for a third straight month in November, a private survey showed on Friday, as the crisis-hit property sector struggles to stabilise despite a slew of government support measures.翻译:周五的一项私人调查显示，中国11月份新房价格连续第三个月小幅上涨，尽管政府采取了一系列支持措施，但受危机打击的房地产行业仍难以企稳。

Prices rose 0.05% on average from the previous month after gains of 0.07% and 0.05%, according to the survey by real estate research firm China Index Academy.翻译:房地产研究公司中国指数研究院的调查显示，继上涨0.07%和0.05%之后，价格平均环比上涨0.05%。

Only 38 of the 100 cities surveyed reported increases in new home prices.翻译:接受调查的 100 个城市中，只有 38 个城市报告新房价格上涨。

China's property sector, which makes up about one-quarter of the world's second-biggest economy, has stumbled from crisis to crisis in a major blow to consumer and investor confidence, keeping economic growth from resuming a solid footing this year.翻译:中国的房地产行业约占全球第二大经济体的四分之一，该行业在一次又一次的危机中陷入困境，对消费者和投资者的信心造成重大打击，导致今年的经济增长无法恢复稳固的基础。

Government support for the property sector in recent months has included easing curbs on home purchases and cutting mortgage costs.翻译:近几个月来，政府对房地产行业的支持包括放松购房限制和降低抵押贷款成本。

China Index Academy said in a report the policy direction for the national property market was clear, and support from the supply and demand sides was expected to continue until the market shows recovery.翻译:中国指数研究院在报告中表示，全国楼市政策方向明确，供需双方的支持预计将持续到市场出现复苏。

A Reuters poll on Wednesday found expectations for 1% growth in new home prices next year, little changed from an August poll.翻译:路透社周三的一项民意调查发现，明年新房价格增长 1% 的预期与 8 月份的民意调查相比几乎没有变化。

"Beijing is turning more proactive to stabilise growth and the new dual-track housing model may help stabilise the property sector in the coming quarters," HSBC said on Thursday.翻译:汇丰银行周四表示，“北京正在更加积极主动地稳定经济增长，新的双轨住房模式可能有助于在未来几个季度稳定房地产行业。”

"This includes making affordable housing accessible and allowing the commercial real estate to return to its commercial nature, i.e., it could be for living or for speculation."翻译:“这包括提供经济适用房，并让商业地产回归其商业性质，即可以用于居住，也可以用于投机。”

Reporting by Liangping Gao and Ryan Woo; Editing by William Mallard翻译:高亮平、吴瑞安报道；威廉·马拉德编辑

item.title: 中国恒大债权人在新提案中寻求控股权
item.description:
A group of offshore creditors to China Evergrande Group (3333.HK) is asking for a controlling equity stake of the developer and two of its Hong Kong subsidiaries as part of company's revised debt restructuring proposal, a source familiar with the matter said on Friday.翻译:一位知情人士周五表示，中国恒大集团（3333.HK）的一组海外债权人正在要求获得该开发商及其两家香港子公司的控股权，作为该公司修订后的债务重组方案的一部分。

Bloomberg News first reported the request on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.翻译:彭博新闻社周五首先援引知情人士的话报道了这一请求。

The group, which works as an ad hoc group of Evergrande's offshore creditors, made the request after the developer earlier this week made a new offer to repay their offshore debts, the source said.翻译:消息人士称，该小组是恒大海外债权人的一个特别小组，在恒大本周早些时候提出偿还其海外债务的新提议后，提出了这一要求。

Reuters reported on Thursday that Evergrande had offered to swap some offshore debt into equity in the company and two Hong Kong-listed units, and repay the rest with non-tradeable "certificates" backed by offshore assets.翻译:路透社周四报道称，恒大集团已提出将部分离岸债务转换为该公司和两家香港上市子公司的股权，并以离岸资产支持的不可交易“证书”偿还其余部分。

Evergrande has until a Hong Kong court hearing on Monday to present a "concrete" revised debt restructuring proposal for offshore creditors, a judge said last month after its original plan had lapsed.翻译:上个月，在恒大原计划失效后，一名法官表示，恒大必须在周一香港法庭听证会上向海外债权人提交一份“具体的”修订后的债务重组方案。

The source declined to be named as the discussions were private.翻译:由于讨论是私下进行，消息人士拒绝透露姓名。

Evergrande declined to comment.翻译:恒大拒绝置评。

Reporting by Xie Yu in Hong Kong, Gnaneshwar Rajan in Bengaluru; Editing by Stephen Coates翻译:谢宇香港报道，Gnaneshwar Rajan 班加罗尔报道；斯蒂芬·科茨编辑

item.title: 交易员权衡美联储降息前景，美元走软
item.description:
The dollar dipped on Friday, while the euro edged higher after steep overnight losses as traders weighed data that showed inflation was easing, stoking expectations that interest rates had peaked and central banks would soon start cutting rates.翻译:美元周五下跌，而欧元在隔夜大幅下跌后小幅走高，交易员权衡显示通胀正在缓和的数据，引发了利率已见顶且央行将很快开始降息的预期。

The dollar index , which measures the U.S. currency against six rivals, was 0.116% lower at 103.33, after clocking its weakest monthly performance in a year in November, despite a 0.6% jump overnight.翻译:衡量美元兑六种货币的美元指数在 11 月份录得一年来最弱的月度表现后，下跌 0.116%，至 103.33，尽管隔夜上涨了 0.6%。

Data on Thursday showed U.S. consumer spending rose moderately in October, while the annual increase in inflation was the smallest in more than 2-1/2 years.翻译:周四的数据显示，美国10月份消费者支出温和增长，而通胀年增幅为2-1/2年多来最小。

The eagerly awaited personal consumption expenditures (PCE) price index rose 3% in October from a year ago, moderating from a three-month string of 3.4% readings though still above the Fed's 2% target.翻译:备受期待的个人消费支出 (PCE) 价格指数 10 月份较去年同期上涨 3%，虽然连续三个月上涨 3.4%，但仍高于美联储 2% 的目标。

"While the 3% level remains too high to declare victory on inflation, it marks a new low for the series that will likely please the Fed and alleviate any pressure to implement further hikes," said Ryan Brandham, head of global capital markets, North America, at Validus Risk Management.翻译:North全球资本市场主管Ryan Brandham表示，“虽然3%的水平仍然过高，不足以宣告通胀取得胜利，但它标志着该系列的新低，这可能会让美联储满意，并减轻实施进一步加息的压力。”美国，Validus 风险管理。

"It remains to be seen if getting from 3% to 2% will be easy, or if inflation will remain sticky in 2024."翻译:“从 3% 升至 2% 是否容易，或者 2024 年通胀是否仍将保持粘性，还有待观察。”

Federal Reserve policymakers signalled on Thursday that the U.S. central bank's interest rate hikes are likely over, but left the door open to further monetary policy tightening should progress on inflation stall.翻译:美联储政策制定者周四表示，美联储加息可能会结束，但如果通胀停滞不前，则可能进一步收紧货币政策。

Markets are pricing in a 97% chance of the Fed standing pat in its December meeting, the CME FedWatch tool showed, with a 46% chance of a rate cut in March next year compared with a 27% chance last week.翻译:CME FedWatch 工具显示，市场定价美联储在 12 月会议上保持不变的可能性为 97%，明年 3 月降息的可能性为 46%，而上周的可能性为 27%。

Investors' focus will now move to comments from Fed Chair Jerome Powell later on Friday, with traders likely to scrutinize every word to sketch out rate outlook.翻译:投资者现在的焦点将转向美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔周五晚些时候的评论，交易员可能会仔细审查每一个字来勾勒利率前景。

"We expect Powell to reiterate the possibility of further tightening and dampen expectations of rate cuts, said Carol Kong, currency strategist at Commonwealth Bank of Australia.翻译:澳大利亚联邦银行货币策略师Carol Kong表示，“我们预计鲍威尔将重申进一步收紧政策的可能性，并抑制降息预期。”

"Further loosening of financial conditions may undermine the FOMC’s efforts to tame inflation pressures. That said, we do not expect the FOMC to tighten policy again."翻译:“金融状况的进一步宽松可能会削弱联邦公开市场委员会抑制通胀压力的努力。尽管如此，我们预计联邦公开市场委员会不会再次收紧政策。”

In Europe, data on Thursday showed Euro zone inflation tumbled more than expected for a third straight month in November, fuelling bets of early spring rate cuts despite the European Central Bank's explicit guidance.翻译:在欧洲，周四的数据显示，欧元区11月份通胀率连续第三个月跌幅超过预期，尽管欧洲央行有明确指引，但仍引发了早春降息的押注。

The data led the euro 0.7% lower on Thursday. It was last up 0.21% at $1.0909. The single currency is down 0.2% for the week.翻译:该数据导致欧元周四下跌0.7%。最后上涨 0.21%，至 1.0909 美元。单一货币本周下跌 0.2%。

Sterling was last at $1.264, up 0.14% on the day.翻译:英镑最新报1.264美元，当日上涨0.14%。

"I think inflation is heading (in) the right direction," Moh Siong Sim, a currency strategist at Bank of Singapore. "We're in the right direction, but not quite there yet in the developed markets."翻译:新加坡银行货币策略师 Moh Siong Sim 表示：“我认为通胀正在朝着正确的方向发展。” “我们的方向是正确的，但在发达市场上还没有完全实现。”

The Japanese yen strengthened 0.06% to 148.09 per dollar, on course for its third straight week of gains against the dollar, pulling it away from the near 33-year low of 151.92 it touched in the middle of November.翻译:日元兑美元汇率上涨0.06%，至148.09日元，兑美元汇率连续第三周上涨，远离11月中旬触及的近33年低点151.92日元。

Rising expectations of the Bank of Japan abandoning its ultra easy monetary policy next year along with a drop in U.S. yields have buoyed the Asian currency in the past few weeks.翻译:对日本央行明年放弃超宽松货币政策的预期不断上升，加上美国收益率下降，过去几周提振了亚洲货币。

Former top Japanese finance ministry bureaucrat and senior central banker Toshiro Muto said on Thursday that chances were high for the Bank of Japan to scrap both negative interest rates and yield control as early as April when annual wage talks confirm the scope of pay hikes.翻译:日本前财务省官僚、央行高级行长武藤敏郎周四表示，当年度工资谈判确认加薪范围时，日本央行最早在 4 月份取消负利率和收益率控制的可能性很大。

The Australian dollar rose 0.06% to $0.661, while the New Zealand dollar rose 0.13% to $0.616..翻译:澳元兑美元上涨0.06%至0.661美元，新西​​兰元兑美元上涨0.13%至0.616美元。

Data showed Asia's factory activity remained weak in November on soft global demand, with mixed signs on the strength of China's economy clouding the outlook for the region's fragile recovery.翻译:数据显示，由于全球需求疲软，11月份亚洲工厂活动依然疲软，中国经济实力的好坏参半的迹象给该地区脆弱的复苏前景蒙上阴影。

Reporting by Ankur Banerjee in Singapore. Editing by Sam Holmes and Kim Coghill翻译:安库尔·班纳吉 (Ankur Banerjee) 驻新加坡报道。山姆·霍姆斯和金·科吉尔编辑

item.title: 亚洲股市 12 月开局疲弱，美元疲软
item.description:
Asian shares edged lower, starting the last month of the year on a weak note after recent rally, although anticipated interest rate cuts in Europe and the United States should help ease pressure on local currencies and central banks.翻译:亚洲股市小幅走低，在最近的上涨之后，今年最后一个月开始表现疲软，尽管欧洲和美国的预期降息应该有助于缓解当地货币和央行的压力。

MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) fell 0.4% after a surge of 7.3% last month, the most since January. Japan's Nikkei (.N225) was flat, having also jumped 8.5% in November in the best month in three years.翻译:MSCI 日本以外最广泛的亚太股市指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS)继上个月飙升 7.3% 后下跌 0.4%，为 1 月份以来的最大涨幅。日本日经指数(.N225)持平，11 月也上涨 8.5%，为三年来最好的月份。

Europe, however, set to open higher, helped by wagers of early and aggressive rate cuts by the European Central Bank after surprisingly soft inflation numbers. EUROSTOXX 50 futures rose 0.4% and FTSE futures gained 0.6%.翻译:然而，在通胀数据出奇疲软之后，欧洲央行预计将提前大幅降息，这推动欧洲股市开盘走高。 EUROSTOXX 50 期货上涨 0.4%，富时指数期货上涨 0.6%。

"Our sense is that quite a lot of the good news is already in the price. A little bit of profit-taking and rebalancing have probably played in the month-end, obscuring the messaging we typically get from the price action," said Rodrigo Catril, a senior FX strategist at the National Australia Bank.翻译:“我们的感觉是，相当多的好消息已经体现在价格中。月底可能会出现一些获利回吐和再平衡，掩盖了我们通常从价格走势中得到的信息，”罗德里戈说卡特里尔是澳大利亚国民银行的高级外汇策略师。

Oil prices, which slid more than 2% overnight as output cuts by OPEC+ producers underwhelmed, remained subdued even as Israel's military said it has resumed combat against Hamas in the Gaza Strip, after a seven-day truce, raising the prospect of renewed violence in the Middle East.翻译:由于 OPEC+ 产油国减产效果不佳，油价隔夜下跌逾 2%，尽管以色列军方表示，在停战 7 天后已恢复对加沙地带哈马斯的战斗，这增加了该地区再次发生暴力的可能性，但油价仍处于低迷状态。中东地区。

Brent crude futures slipped 0.2% at $80.67 a barrel while U.S. West Texas Intermediate futures was little changed at $75.94 a barrel.翻译:布伦特原油期货下跌 0.2%，至每桶 80.67 美元，而美国西德克萨斯中质原油期货几乎没有变化，至每桶 75.94 美元。

Regional surveys of purchasing managers showed factory activity in Asia remained weak. Japan's factory activity shrank at the fastest pace in nine months while South Korea's factory activity were unchanged after 16 months of contraction.翻译:对采购经理的区域调查显示，亚洲的工厂活动仍然疲弱。日本工厂活动以九个月来最快速度萎缩，而韩国工厂活动在经历了 16 个月收缩后没有变化。

Mixed factory activity data for China pointed to still feeble economic recovery in November. Chinese bluechips (.CSI300) fell 0.2% and Hong Kong's Hang Seng index (.HSI) dropped 0.1%.翻译:中国工厂活动数据好坏参半，表明 11 月份经济复苏依然微弱。中国蓝筹股（.CSI300）下跌0.2%，香港恒生指数（.HSI）下跌0.1%。

S&P 500 futures eased 0.1% and Nasdaq futures fell 0.2%.翻译:标准普尔 500 指数期货下跌 0.1%，纳斯达克指数期货下跌 0.2%。

Overnight, data showed that both U.S. and European inflation are cooling as desired. Benign data on U.S. inflation reinforced market expectations for about 115 basis points in rate cuts from the Federal Reserve next year, with a first move fully priced in for May.翻译:一夜之间，数据显示美国和欧洲的通胀正在按预期降温。 美国通胀数据良好，增强了市场对美联储明年降息约 115 个基点的预期，其中 5 月份的首次降息已完全反映在市场中。

The major surprise was with euro zone inflation, which missed forecasts by a large margin, triggering a slide in the euro and prompting markets to price in rate cuts of about 110 basis points next year, commencing as early as April.翻译:最令人意外的是欧元区通胀大幅低于预期，引发欧元贬值，并促使市场消化明年最早从 4 月份开始降息约 110 个基点的预期。

Goldman Sachs now expects the ECB to deliver its first interest rate cut in the second quarter of 2024, compared to an earlier forecast of a cut in the third quarter.翻译:高盛目前预计欧洲央行将在 2024 年第二季度首次降息，此前的预测是第三季度降息。

Traders are now waiting for Fed Chair Jerome Powell's Q&A appearance on Friday, with bulls betting the central bank chief will accommodate market wishes.翻译:交易员现在正在等待周五美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔的问答，多头押注美联储主席将满足市场愿望。

"We suspect this will be a very tightly choreographed session and will stick to the pre-Waller script of caution when it comes to further hikes but with no hint of easing," said Robert Carnell, regional head of research, Asia-Pacific, at ING.翻译:“我们怀疑这将是一次精心设计的会议，在进一步加息时将坚持沃勒之前的谨慎脚本，但没有放松的迹象，”亚太地区研究主管罗伯特·卡内尔(Robert Carnell)表示。 ING。

Fed Governor Christopher Waller, deemed a hawk, this week hinted at lower interest rates in the months ahead if inflation continued to ease.翻译:被视为鹰派的美联储理事克里斯托弗·沃勒(Christopher Waller)本周暗示，如果通胀继续放缓，未来几个月将降低利率。

Declining interest rates in Europe and the U.S. would be good news for Asia, greatly easing the pressure on emerging market currencies. Investors are turning more bullish on Asian currencies, a Reuters poll found.翻译:欧洲和美国利率下降对亚洲来说是个好消息，大大缓解了新兴市场货币的压力。 路透调查发现，投资者变得更加看好亚洲货币。

The dollar index was on the back foot at 103.32 on Friday after jumping 0.6% overnight, supported by a sliding euro on ECB's rate cut expectations. It fell 3% for November, the worst in a year.翻译:美元指数隔夜上涨0.6%，周五收于103.32，受到欧洲央行降息预期欧元下滑的支撑。 11 月份下跌 3%，为一年来最严重的跌幅。

The euro recovered some lost ground in Asia and was last up 0.2% to $1.0903, after tumbling 0.7% overnight.翻译:欧元在亚洲收复部分失地，继隔夜下跌 0.7% 后，最终上涨 0.2% 至 1.0903 美元。

U.S. Treasuries also eased a little after the best month since 2011. The yield on 10-year Treasury notes slipped 2 basis points in Asia to 4.3320%, on top of a plunge of 52.2 basis points for the month.翻译:美国国债在经历 2011 年以来最好的一个月后也小幅回落。亚洲 10 年期国债收益率在本月暴跌 52.2 个基点的基础上下跌 2 个基点至 4.3320%。

Two-year Treasury yields fell 4 basis points to 4.6771%.翻译:两年期国债收益率下跌4个基点至4.6771%。

Gold prices was 0.26% higher at $2,041.29 per ounce.翻译:金价上涨 0.26%，至每盎司 2,041.29 美元。

Reporting by Stella Qiu; Editing by Jamie Freed and Miral Fahmy翻译:邱斯特拉报道；编辑：杰米·弗里德和米拉尔·法赫米

item.title: 马来西亚邀请中国习近平访华并提高旅游目标
item.description:
Malaysia has invited China's President Xi Jingping to visit, its ambassador to Beijing said on Friday, as the Southeast Asian country also seeks to boost the number of Chinese tourists to five million a year to fuel economic growth.翻译:马来西亚驻北京大使周五表示，马来西亚已邀请中国国家主席习近平访问，该东南亚国家还寻求将中国游客数量增加到每年 500 万人次，以推动经济增长。

China and Malaysia will mark the 50th anniversary of their bilateral diplomatic relations next year, and Malaysia recently announced tourists from China would be able to travel visa free for 30 days, a move mirroring Thailand.翻译:中国和马来西亚明年将庆祝双边建交50周年，马来西亚最近宣布中国游客将可以免签旅行30天，此举与泰国类似。

Government data showed Malaysia welcomed 498,540 Chinese tourists in the six months to June this year, a figure almost a third of pre-pandemic levels. In comparison, Thailand said it expected 3.4-3.5 million visitors from China this year.翻译:政府数据显示，今年截至6月的六个月内，马来西亚接待了498,540名中国游客，这一数字几乎是大流行前水平的三分之一。相比之下，泰国预计今年将有 340 至 350 万名中国游客。

"We see that we have a big capacity to receive tourists," Ambassador Norman Muhamad said at an event at the Malaysian embassy in Beijing, adding that the goal is not "far-fetched" even if it may take more than a couple of years to achieve.翻译:大使诺曼·穆罕默德在马来西亚驻北京大使馆举行的一次活动中表示：“我们看到我们有很大的接待游客的能力。”他补充说，这一目标并不“牵强”，即使可能需要几年以上的时间实现。

"Since we are seeking more investment from China, this visa-free travel to Malaysia will also help Chinese investors to come to Malaysia to find opportunities," he added.翻译:他补充说：“由于我们正在寻求更多来自中国的投资，马来西亚的免签证旅行也将有助于中国投资者来马来西亚寻找机会。”

Malaysia's economic growth is expected to meet the government's target of 4% this year, driven in part by stronger tourism.翻译:马来西亚今年的经济增长预计将达到政府 4% 的目标，部分原因是旅游业的强劲增长。

Malaysia's Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim has also invited China's President Xi Jinping to visit the country, Norman said.翻译:诺曼说，马来西亚总理安瓦尔·易卜拉欣还邀请中国国家主席习近平访问该国。

"We are hoping that President Xi will consent to visiting Malaysia," he added.翻译:“我们希望习主席同意访问马来西亚，”他补充道。

Earlier this week, China's foreign minister Wang Yi was seen holding hands with his Malaysian counterpart Zambry Abdul Kadir in New York, photos released by the Chinese foreign ministry show.翻译:中国外交部发布的照片​​显示，本周早些时候，中国外交部长王毅在纽约与马来西亚外长赞布里·阿卜杜勒·卡迪尔手牵着手。

Reporting by Liz Lee, Bernard Orr and Ethan Wang; Editing by Jacqueline Wong and Miral Fahmy翻译:Liz Lee、Bernard Orr 和 Ethan Wang 报道；编辑：Jacqueline Wong 和 Miral Fahmy

item.title: 马来西亚接回121名被困缅甸冲突的疑似工作诈骗受害者
item.description:
A total of 121 people, mostly Malaysians suspected of being victims of job scams, were evacuated from Myanmar on Friday after being stranded by fighting between the military and rebel groups in the country's north, Malaysia's foreign ministry said.翻译:马来西亚外交部称，周五共有 121 人从缅甸撤离，其中大部分是涉嫌就业诈骗的马来西亚人，他们因缅甸北部军方与叛乱组织之间的战斗而被困。

The group, which included an Indonesian national, arrived at Kuala Lumpur International Airport at 3:24 a.m. local time (1924 GMT) through a specially arranged flight from Kunming, China, the ministry said in a statement.翻译:外交部在一份声明中表示，这群人包括一名印度尼西亚公民，于当地时间凌晨 3 点 24 分（格林威治标准时间 1924 年）乘坐特别安排的航班从中国昆明抵达吉隆坡国际机场。

The evacuation mission was carried out through the Myanmar-China border starting Thursday morning with the cooperation and approval of the countries involved, the ministry said.翻译:该部表示，在有关国家的合作和批准下，撤离任务于周四上午开始通过缅中边境进行。

The mission came amid continuous fighting in northern Myanmar after an alliance of armed ethnic groups launched an offensive in late October. The groups have seized control of several towns and military outposts near the country's border with China, disrupting trade.翻译:这次任务是在缅甸北部武装民族联盟于十月下旬发动攻势后持续不断的战斗中进行的。这些组织控制了该国与中国边境附近的几个城镇和军事哨所，扰乱了贸易。

Malaysia's deputy foreign minister Mohamad Alamin said the rescued group were among 128 people stranded in Laukkaing, a town in Myanmar's northern Shan state, state news agency Bernama reported on Friday.翻译:据国家通讯社马新社周五报道，马来西亚外交部副部长穆罕默德·阿拉明表示，获救的人是滞留在缅甸北部掸邦劳坎镇的 128 人之一。

Malaysia's government will monitor developments and is ready to evacuate the remaining seven people who were unable to be rescued, Bernama quoted Mohamad as saying.翻译:马新社援引穆罕默德的话说，马来西亚政府将监测事态发展，并准备撤离其余七名无法获救的人。

Hundreds of Malaysians have been rescued from cybercrime and job scam networks across Southeast Asia in recent years. Victims of the rackets say they are lured by promises of high-paying jobs and accommodation benefits, but are often instead forced to live in compounds and defraud online users.翻译:近年来，数百名马来西亚人从东南亚各地的网络犯罪和就业诈骗网络中获救。诈骗的受害者表示，他们被高薪工作和住宿福利的承诺所吸引，但往往被迫住在大院里并欺骗在线用户。

Reporting by Rozanna Latiff. Editing by Gerry Doyle翻译:罗扎娜·拉蒂夫报道。格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: 对比中国 11 月工厂调查凸显需要采取更强有力的刺激措施
item.description:
Mixed factory activity data for China in November suggests more stimulus will be needed to shore up economic growth, analysts said on Friday, as two surveys came to contrasting conclusions on the sector's health.翻译:分析师周五表示，中国 11 月份工厂活动数据好坏参半，表明需要采取更多刺激措施来支撑经济增长，因为两项调查对该行业健康状况得出了截然不同的结论。

China's economy has struggled to mount a strong post-COVID recovery due to an ailing housing market, local government debt risks and slow global growth. That has squeezed factory owners who have had to contend with high input costs, overcapacity, soft demand, and officials prioritising rescuing other parts of the economy.翻译:由于房地产市场不景气、地方政府债务风险和全球经济增长放缓，中国经济在疫情后难以实现强劲复苏。这对工厂主造成了压力，他们不得不应对高投入成本、产能过剩、需求疲软以及优先拯救经济其他部分的官员。

The Caixin/S&P Global manufacturing purchasing managers' index (PMI) unexpectedly rose to 50.7 in November from a 49.5 reading in October.翻译:财新/标普全球制造业采购经理人指数 (PMI) 意外从 10 月份的 49.5 升至 11 月份的 50.7。

That was the fastest expansion in three months, but stands in contrast to the official PMI which fell to 49.4 on Thursday. The 50-point mark separates growth from contraction.翻译:这是三个月来最快的扩张，但与周四跌至49.4 的官方 PMI 形成鲜明对比。 50分是增长与收缩的分界线。

"At face value, the average of the two is consistent with factory activity remaining largely unchanged last month," said Sheana Yue, China economist at Capital Economics.翻译:凯投宏观(Capital Economics)中国经济学家谢娜·岳(Sheana Yue)表示：“从表面上看，两者的平均值与上个月工厂活动基本保持不变是一致的。”

"But that may not be the case in practice - the hard data have held up better than survey-based measures lately."翻译:“但实际情况可能并非如此——硬数据最近比基于调查的措施更有效。”

The official and Caixin surveys have different samples, with the Caixin PMI focusing on export-oriented enterprises and small- and medium-sized enterprises in the country's coastal region.翻译:官方和财新调查的样本不同，财新PMI主要针对沿海地区的出口导向型企业和中小企业。

"The economy is running at different speeds across industries, though we expect the policy stance to remain proactive which will help to sustain overall growth momentum into the coming quarters," economists at HSBC said on Thursday.翻译:汇丰银行经济学家周四表示：“各行业经济运行速度不同，但我们预计政策立场将保持积极主动，这将有助于维持未来几个季度的整体增长势头。”

The Caixin survey data was supported by the quickest rise since June in new orders received by Chinese goods producers in November, but in the official survey new orders dipped back into contraction.翻译:财新调查数据得到了11月份中国商品生产商收到的新订单自6月份以来最快增长的支撑，但官方调查显示新订单再次陷入萎缩。

The official survey has contracted for seven out of the past eight months, while the Caixin survey has been more volatile, dipping in and out of contraction three times over the same period.翻译:过去八个月中，官方调查有七个月出现收缩，而财新调查的波动性更大，同一时期内出现了三次收缩。

The last time the official indicator was negative for more than three consecutive months was in the six months to October 2019, suggesting pessimism has become entrenched among some factory owners.翻译:官方指标上一次连续三个月以上为负值是在截至2019年10月的六个月内，这表明一些工厂主的悲观情绪已经根深蒂固。

"I don't think there can be a fix," said Dan Wang, chief economist at Hang Seng Bank China on Thursday, warning factory activity was unlikely to improve anytime soon as other economic problems dominate.翻译:恒生银行中国首席经济学家王丹周四表示：“我认为没有解决办法。”他警告说，由于其他经济问题占主导地位，工厂活动不太可能很快改善。

"The priority now is clearly containing the local government debt risk and the risk posed by regional banks."翻译:“现在的首要任务显然是控制地方政府债务风险和地方银行带来的风险。”

China's consumer prices swung lower in October, as key gauges of domestic demand pointed to weakness not seen since the pandemic, while factory-gate deflation deepened.翻译:中国十月份的消费者价格下跌，因为国内需求的关键指标显示出自疫情大流行以来未见的疲软，同时工厂通货紧缩加剧。

In a nod to the need to step up support for industry, Chinese president Xi Jinping visited the Yangtze River Delt region on Thursday. He called for closer integration across the sprawling industrial hub encompassing several major cities with millions of people, as well as China's biggest port in Shanghai.翻译:为了加强对工业的支持，中国国家主席习近平周四访问了长江三角洲地区。他呼吁在这个庞大的工业中心进行更紧密的整合，其中包括几个拥有数百万人口的主要城市以及中国最大的港口上海。

But weak external demand remained an important factor affecting factory activity in both surveys, with the new export index registering 49.0 and contracting for a fifth consecutive month in November in the Caixin survey and 46.8 in the official one.翻译:但在两次调查中，外部需求疲软仍然是影响工厂活动的重要因素，财新调查显示，11月份新出口指数为49.0，连续第五个月收缩，官方调查为46.8。

Payroll cuts in the sector persisted for the third month in the Caixin survey and a ninth month in the official PMI.翻译:财新调查显示，该行业已连续第三个月削减工资，官方 PMI 数据显示，该行业已连续第九个月削减工资。

Reporting by Liangping Gao and Joe Cash; Editing by Jacqueline Wong and Lincoln Feast.翻译:高亮平和乔·卡什的报道；杰奎琳·王和林肯·费斯特编辑。

item.title: 美国法官阻止蒙大拿州禁止 TikTok 在该州使用
item.description:
A U.S. judge late on Thursday blocked Montana's first-of-its kind state ban on the use of short-video sharing app TikTok from taking effect on Jan. 1, saying it violated the free speech rights of users.翻译:周四晚些时候，一名美国法官阻止了蒙大拿州首个禁止使用短视频分享应用 TikTok 的州禁令于 1 月 1 日生效，称该禁令侵犯了用户的言论自由权。

U.S. District Judge Donald Molloy issued a preliminary injunction to block the ban on the Chinese-owned app, saying the state ban "violates the Constitution in more ways than one" and "oversteps state power."翻译:美国地区法官唐纳德·莫洛伊发布了一项初步禁令，阻止对这款中国应用程序的禁令，称该州禁令“在多种方面违反了宪法”并且“超越了国家权力”。

TikTok, owned by China's ByteDance, sued Montana in May, seeking to block the U.S. state ban on several grounds, arguing that it violates the First Amendment free speech rights of the company and users.翻译:中国字节跳动旗下的 TikTok 今年 5 月起诉蒙大拿州，以多项理由寻求阻止美国州的禁令，称其侵犯了公司和用户的第一修正案自由言论权。

TikTok users in Montana also filed suit to block the ban approved by the state legislature which cited concerns about the personal data of Montana users and potential Chinese spying.翻译:蒙大拿州的 TikTok 用户也提起诉讼，要求阻止州立法机构批准的禁令，该禁令的理由是对蒙大拿州用户个人数据和潜在的中国间谍活动的担忧。

TikTok said it was pleased the judge "rejected this unconstitutional law and hundreds of thousands of Montanans can continue to express themselves, earn a living, and find community on TikTok."翻译:TikTok 表示，很高兴法官“驳回了这项违宪法律，数十万蒙大拿州人可以继续在 TikTok 上表达自己、谋生并找到社区。”

A spokesperson for Montana state attorney general Austin Knudsen's office, which defended the ban, noted the ruling was preliminary and said "the analysis could change as the case proceeds."翻译:蒙大拿州总检察长奥斯汀·克努森办公室的发言人为该禁令辩护，指出该裁决是初步的，并表示“随着案件的进展，分析可能会发生变化。”

Knudsen's office added it was considering its next steps and looks "forward to presenting the complete legal argument to defend the law that protects Montanans from the Chinese Communist Party obtaining and using their data."翻译:克努森办公室补充说，它正在考虑下一步行动，并期待“提出完整的法律论据，以捍卫保护蒙大拿人免受中国共产党获取和使用他们的数据的法律。”

TikTok said in earlier court filings it "has not shared, and would not share, U.S. user data with the Chinese government, and has taken substantial measures to protect the privacy and security of TikTok users."翻译:TikTok 在早些时候的法庭文件中表示，它“没有也不会与中国政府分享美国用户数据，并已采取实质性措施保护 TikTok 用户的隐私和安全。”

Molloy, who was appointed to the bench by Democratic President Bill Clinton, found merit in numerous arguments raised by TikTok and referenced what he termed "the pervasive undertone of anti-Chinese sentiment that permeates" the state's legal case and legislation.翻译:被民主党总统比尔·克林顿任命为法官的莫洛伊认为 TikTok 提出的众多论点都有道理，并提到了他所说的“渗透到该州法律案件和立法中的普遍反华情绪”。

Montana could have imposed fines of $10,000 for each violation by TikTok in the state but the now blocked state law did not impose penalties on individual TikTok users.翻译:蒙大拿州本可以对 TikTok 在该州的每次违规行为处以 10,000 美元的罚款，但现已被封锁的州法律并未对 TikTok 个人用户实施处罚。

Molloy said Montana sought to exercise foreign policy authority held by the federal government and the state's action was too sweeping.翻译:莫洛伊表示，蒙大拿州试图行使联邦政府的外交政策权力，但该州的行动过于笼统。

TikTok has faced efforts by some in Congress to ban the app or give the Biden administration powers to impose restrictions or bar foreign-owned apps, but those efforts have stalled.翻译:TikTok 面临国会中一些人试图禁止该应用程序或赋予拜登政府施加限制或禁止外资应用程序的权力，但这些努力已经陷入停滞。

Many states and the U.S. government have barred TikTok on government-owned devices, but only Montana has sought to completely bar the app's use.翻译:许多州和美国政府都禁止在政府拥有的设备上使用 TikTok，但只有蒙大拿州试图完全禁止该应用程序的使用。

Former President Donald Trump in 2020 sought to bar new downloads of TikTok and Chinese-owned WeChat, but a series of court decisions blocked the effective ban from taking effect.翻译:2020 年，前总统唐纳德·特朗普曾试图禁止 TikTok 和中国微信的新下载，但一系列法院判决阻止了这一有效禁令的生效。

Reporting by David Shepardson; Editing by Chris Reese and Sonali Paul翻译:大卫·谢泼德森报道；克里斯·里斯和索纳利·保罗编辑
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: TikTok 迈出了启用挪威数据中心的第一步
item.description:
TikTok has taken possession of a facility in Norway built by data centre group Green Mountain AS which will become the social media company's largest in Europe as it seeks to store data generated in the region locally.翻译:TikTok 已拥有数据中心集团 Green Mountain AS 在挪威建造的设施，该设施将成为这家社交媒体公司在欧洲最大的设施，因为它寻求在本地存储该地区生成的数据。

The company, owned by China-headquartered Bytedance, has been trying to address concerns over whether the Chinese government could access the data of European citizens who use TikTok.翻译:这家总部位于中国的字节跳动公司旗下的公司一直在努力解决有关中国政府是否可以访问使用 TikTok 的欧洲公民数据的担忧。

Several countries, the European Parliament, European Commission and others have banned TikTok from staff phones due to those concerns.翻译:出于这些担忧，一些国家、欧洲议会、欧盟委员会和其他机构已禁止在员工手机上使用 TikTok。

"We understand the skepticism. And that's precisely why we're not just doing the step of putting the data in Europe, building that digital barrier around it," Theo Bertram, TikTok's VP of government relations and public policy, told Reuters.翻译:TikTok 政府关系和公共政策副总裁西奥·伯特伦 (Theo Bertram) 对路透社表示：“我们理解这种怀疑。这正是我们不只是采取将数据放在欧洲、围绕其建立数字屏障的原因。”

"We are taking the extra step of saying we know you're skeptical about us, and so we know we have to earn that trust."翻译:“我们采取了额外的措施，表示我们知道您对我们持怀疑态度，因此我们知道我们必须赢得这种信任。”

TikTok in March launched a data security regime called Project Clover to build data centres and store European user data locally.翻译:TikTok于3月份推出了名为Project Clover的数据安全制度，在本地建立数据中心并存储欧洲用户数据。

The Norwegian data centre will be in the town of Hamar where TikTok will store data spread over three buildings and the first phase will start operating from next summer.翻译:挪威数据中心将位于哈马尔镇，TikTok 将在那里存储分布在三栋建筑中的数据，第一阶段将从明年夏天开始运营。

The Norway data centre will run completely on renewable energy and generate heat that could be re-used. TikTok said a third-party provider is talking with multiple industries and research institutions for potential projects that can benefit from this level of heat re-use.翻译:挪威数据中心将完全依靠可再生能源运行，并产生可重复利用的热量。 TikTok 表示，一家第三方提供商正在与多个行业和研究机构洽谈可以从这种程度的热量再利用中受益的潜在项目。

TikTok said it plans to spend 12 billion euros over the next 10 years for Project Clover. It had earlier announced plans to spend 1.2 billion euros annually.翻译:TikTok表示，计划在未来10年为Project Clover斥资120亿欧元。它早些时候曾宣布计划每年支出12亿欧元。

This will cover the cost of building three data centres, the implementation of privacy enhancing technologies and for employing British cybersecurity firm NCC (NCCG.L) to audit its data controls and provide independent verification.翻译:这将涵盖建设三个数据中心、实施隐私增强技术以及聘请英国网络安全公司 NCC (NCCG.L)审核其数据控制并提供独立验证的费用。

"One of the things in the contract with NCC is they can go and talk to data protection authorities, talk to national cyber security organisations, without us being involved," Bertram said.翻译:Bertram 表示：“与 NCC 签订的合同中的一项内容是，他们可以与数据保护机构、国家网络安全组织进行对话，而无需我们参与。”

Reporting by Victoria in Norway; additional reporting by Supantha Mukherjee in Stockholm. Editing by Jane Merriman翻译:维多利亚在挪威的报道； Supantha Mukherjee 在斯德哥尔摩的补充报道。简·梅里曼编辑

item.title: 法国部长前往印度太平洋地区和澳大利亚推动外交
item.description:
Summary:
  • French defence minister to host South Pacific counterparts
  • Paris eyes further military ties with Philippines, Malaysia
  • Foreign minister heads to Australia, first since submarine spat
翻译:概括：
  • 法国国防部长将接待南太平洋同行
  • 巴黎希望与菲律宾和马来西亚进一步加强军事关系
  • 自潜艇争端以来外交部长首次访问澳大利亚

France's defence and foreign ministers travel to the Indo-Pacific next week as part of a diplomatic offensive to strengthen political and military ties, and rebuild its relationship with key partner Australia.翻译:法国国防部长和外交部长下周将前往印度-太平洋地区，作为加强政治和军事关系并重建与主要伙伴澳大利亚关系的外交攻势的一部分。

France, with overseas territories in the Pacific and Indian Ocean and 7,000 troops stationed there, considers itself an Indo-Pacific power.翻译:法国在太平洋和印度洋拥有海外领土，并驻扎着7000名军队，自认为是印太大国。

The loss of a major submarine deal with Australia in 2021 forced it rethink its strategy amid ongoing regional tensions with China in the disputed South China Sea.翻译:2021 年与澳大利亚签订的一项重大潜艇交易的失败迫使澳大利亚在有争议的南海地区与中国持续紧张的情况下重新考虑其战略。

Paris has since struck arms and security deals with several powers, including India, Malaysia and Indonesia as well as reinforcing ties with Japan.翻译:此后，巴黎与印度、马来西亚和印度尼西亚等多个国家达成了武器和安全协议，并加强了与日本的关系。

It aims to complete a new regional strategy plan for the start of 2024 that would encompass everything from security to culture, climate and define efforts by specific zones, diplomats said.翻译:外交官们表示，它的目标是在 2024 年初完成一项新的区域战略计划，该计划将涵盖从安全到文化、气候的各个方面，并确定特定区域的努力。

Underscoring those efforts, Defence Minister Sebastien Lecornu will host in the French overseas territory of New Caledonia between Dec. 4-8 the South Pacific Defence Ministers Meeting, the first time it has hosted the format since it was created in 2013.翻译:为了强调这些努力，国防部长塞巴斯蒂安·勒科尔努将于 12 月 4 日至 8 日在法国海外领土新喀里多尼亚主办南太平洋国防部长会议，这是该会议自 2013 年创建以来首次主办。

"This is an important moment for us because it highlights the legitimacy of our presence in the Pacific," said a French diplomatic source briefing reporters ahead of the visits.翻译:一位法国外交消息人士在访问前向记者介绍情况时表示：“这对我们来说是一个重要时刻，因为它凸显了我们在太平洋存在的合法性。”

The meeting will seek to enhance security and defence coordination between the countries in the region alongside Britain, the United States and Japan which attend as observers.翻译:此次会议将寻求加强该地区国家与作为观察员出席的英国、美国和日本之间的安全和防务协调。

Prior to that, Lecornu will be in the Philippines, where he is expected to sign a letter of intent on defence cooperation with a view to sealing concrete defence deals at a later stage, diplomats said.翻译:外交官称，在此之前，勒科努将前往菲律宾，预计他将签署一份防务合作意向书，以期在稍后阶段达成具体防务协议。

Paris, which is vying with South Korea and Spain for the sale of submarines to Manila, sees the election of President Ferdinand Marcos as an opportunity to develop their partnership.

RENEWED AUSTRALIAN PARTNERSHIP

France has historically supported Manila's stance in the territorial dispute between Philippines and China over the South China, which has ratcheted up this year as Manila has increasingly complained about Beijing's "aggressive" behaviour in the strategic waterway.翻译:法国历来支持马尼拉在菲律宾与中国围绕南中国海的领土争端中的立场，随着马尼拉越来越多地抱怨北京在战略航道上的“侵略”行为，这一争端今年愈演愈烈。

Lecornu will also head to Malaysia where a letter of intent is due to be signed, although French officials have declined to give details.翻译:勒科尔努还将前往马来西亚，在那里签署意向书，但法国官员拒绝透露细节。

Malaysia has been looking to upgrade or replace several aging military assets, with the government allocating 19.7 billion ringgit ($4.23 billion) to the defence ministry under its budget for 2024, an 11% increase from this year's funding.翻译:马来西亚一直在寻求升级或更换一些老化的军事资产，政府在 2024 年预算中向国防部拨款 197 亿林吉特（42.3 亿美元），比今年的资金增加了 11%。

The ministry in October said it would look to use the funding for new purchases and improvements, including refurbishing its two French-made, Scorpene-class submarines.翻译:该部十月份表示，将考虑利用这笔资金进行新的采购和改进，包括翻新两艘法国制造的鲉鱼级潜艇。

While it has diversified its ties across the Pacific, France has also worked on rebuilding its partnership with Australia.翻译:在实现跨太平洋关系多元化的同时，法国也致力于重建与澳大利亚的伙伴关系。

Dating back to 2016, it was considered the cornerstone of its Indo-Pacific policy until Canberra pulled out of a multi-billion dollar submarine and strategic defence accord two years ago.翻译:自2016年以来，它一直被认为是其印太政策的基石，直到两年前堪培拉退出了一项价值数十亿美元的潜艇和战略防御协议。

Foreign Minister Catherine Colonna will head there on Dec. 4-5, the first visit by a French foreign minister since 2019 as the two sides look to definitively turn the page and progress on topics ranging from climate change to culture and defence.翻译:外交部长凯瑟琳·科隆纳将于 12 月 4 日至 5 日前往法国，这是法国外交部长自 2019 年以来的首次访问，双方都希望彻底翻开新的一页，并在气候变化、文化和国防等议题上取得进展。

"It's the culmination of 18 months of work," the diplomatic source said.翻译:外交消息人士称：“这是 18 个月工作的结晶。”

item.title: 早盘竞价：12 月欢呼，中国恐惧
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。

Asian markets round out the week on Friday in reasonably good spirits, with a deluge of purchasing managers index data from across the continent and a sprinkling of key indicators from Japan, South Korea and Indonesia the most likely market-moving catalysts.翻译:亚洲市场在周五的一周中表现相当良好，来自整个非洲大陆的大量采购经理人指数数据以及日本、韩国和印度尼西亚的一些关键指标最有可能推动市场走势。

Friday is also the first trading day of December, so perhaps an opportunity to get the last month of the year off to a positive start.翻译:周五也是 12 月的第一个交易日，因此也许是一个让今年最后一个月有一个良好开端的机会。

The Dow Jones on Thursday posted its highest close in nearly two years, and if broader market momentum from November spills over, that is a likely scenario - for some Asian stock markets, November was the best month in a long time.翻译:道琼斯指数周四创下近两年来的最高收盘价，如果 11 月份的大盘动能蔓延开来，那么这种情况很可能发生——对于一些亚洲股市来说，11 月份是长期以来表现最好的一个月。

On the other hand, Thursday's month-end reversal in the dollar and bonds - the dollar and Treasury yields rose sharply - will sound a loud note of caution.翻译:另一方面，周四美元和债券的月末反转——美元和国债收益率大幅上涨——将敲响响亮的警告声。

Unemployment data from Japan, trade data from South Korea, and the latest readout on inflation from Indonesia are among the highlights on the Asian economic calendar, along with a raft of purchasing managers index reports from across the region.翻译:日本的失业数据、 韩国的贸易数据、印度尼西亚最新的通胀数据以及来自该地区的大量采购经理人指数报告都是亚洲经济日历上的亮点。

They include Australia, South Korea and India, as well as China's 'unofficial' PMI. The 'official' PMI report from the National Bureau of Statistics on Thursday showed that manufacturing activity in China shrank for a second month in November, and at a faster rate than had been expected.翻译:其中包括澳大利亚、韩国和印度，以及中国的“非官方”PMI。国家统计局周四发布的“官方”PMI 报告显示，11 月份中国制造业活动连续第二个月萎缩，且收缩速度快于预期。

A similar reading on Friday will only enhance the already growing calls for more stimulus.翻译:周五的类似数据只会加剧本已日益高涨的更多刺激措施的呼声。

China's leading index of blue chip stocks fell 2% in November, its fourth monthly decline in a row. It is down almost 10% year-to-date, underperforming most of its regional and global peers.翻译:中国蓝筹股领先指数11月份下跌2%，连续第四个月下跌。今年迄今为止，该公司已下跌近 10%，表现落后于大多数区域和全球同行。

The MSCI Asia ex-Japan and emerging market indexes both snapped three-month losing streaks in November, rising 7% or more for their best month since January, while Japan's Nikkei gained 8.5% for its best month in three years.翻译:MSCI 亚洲（日本除外）指数和新兴市场指数在 11 月份均结束了三个月的连跌，上涨 7% 或更多，为 1 月份以来的最佳月份，而日本日经指数则上涨 8.5%，为三年来的最佳月份。

The general gloom surrounding China's economy and financial markets shows little sign of lifting, despite some sporadic positive surprises recently like the strong third quarter GDP growth figures.翻译:尽管最近出现了一些零星的积极惊喜，例如强劲的第三季度GDP增长数据，但围绕中国经济和金融市场的普遍阴霾几乎没有缓解的迹象。

A survey by central banking think tank OMFIF of 22 public pension and sovereign wealth funds managing $4.3 trillion in assets, showed that none reported a positive outlook for China's economy.翻译:央行智库OMFIF对管理着4.3万亿美元资产的22家公共养老金和主权财富基金进行的调查显示， 没有一家对中国经济前景持乐观态度。

They cited the regulatory environment and geopolitics among primary factors dissuading them from investing. Foreigners already appear to be voting with their feet - China just recorded its first-ever quarterly deficit in foreign direct investment.翻译:他们指出，监管环境和地缘政治是阻碍他们投资的主要因素。外国人似乎已经用脚投票——中国刚刚出现了历史上首次季度外国直接投资赤字。

As more aggressive Fed rate cut expectations chip away at the U.S. dollar, investors are turning more bullish on Asian currencies, a Reuters poll found. Perhaps unsurprisingly, one of the few exceptions is the Chinese yuan.翻译:路透调查发现，随着美联储更激进的降息预期削弱美元，投资者变得更加看好亚洲货币。也许并不奇怪，人民币是少数例外之一。

Still, the yuan is trading around its strongest level against the dollar since June and just clocked its biggest monthly gain in a year, rising around 2.5% in November.翻译:尽管如此，人民币兑美元汇率仍处于自 6 月份以来的最高水平附近，并刚刚创下一年来最大月度涨幅，11 月份上涨约 2.5%。

Here are key developments that could provide more direction to markets on Friday:翻译:以下是周五可能为市场提供更多方向的关键进展：

- PMIs for Australia, South Korea, India, China翻译:- 澳大利亚、韩国、印度、中国的采购经理人指数

- Japan unemployment (October)翻译:- 日本失业率（十月）

- Indonesia inflation (October)翻译:- 印度尼西亚通货膨胀（十月）

By Jamie McGeever Editing by Josie Kao翻译:作者：Jamie McGeever 编辑：Josie Kao

item.title: 美国立法者寻求对中国无人机制造商Autel Robotics进行调查
item.description:
A bipartisan group of 11 U.S. House lawmakers on Thursday asked the Biden administration to investigate and potentially sanction Chinese drone maker Autel Robotics, citing national security concerns.翻译:周四，由 11 名美国众议院议员组成的两党小组以国家安全为由，要求拜登政府调查并可能制裁中国无人机制造商 Autel Robotics。

The letter, signed by House China select committee chair Mike Gallagher, a Republican, and the panel's top Democrat, Raja Krishnamoorthi, asked the Commerce, Defense and Treasury departments to investigate Autel Robotics, whose parent company is Autel Intelligent Technology (688208.SS).翻译:这封信由众议院中国特别委员会主席、共和党人迈克·加拉格尔(Mike Gallagher)和该委员会的民主党领袖拉贾·克里希纳莫蒂(Raja Krishnamoorthi)签署，要求商务部、国防部和财政部调查Autel Robotics，其母公司是Autel智能科技(688208.SS) 。

The letter said Autel Robotics is openly affiliated with China's People’s Liberation Army (PLA) "and poses a direct threat to U.S. national security as local law enforcement and state and local governments are purchasing and operating Autel drones, potentially exposing sensitive data across the country."翻译:信中称，Autel Robotics 公开隶属于中国人民解放军（PLA），“对美国国家安全构成直接威胁，因为地方执法部门以及州和地方政府正在购买和操作 Autel 无人机，可能会泄露全国各地的敏感数据。” ”

The Pentagon said it would respond to the lawmakers' letter. Commerce and Treasury did not immediately comment. Autel could not immediately be reached for comment.翻译:五角大楼表示将对议员们的信函做出回应。商务部和财政部没有立即发表评论。未能立即联系到 Autel 置评。

Another signer of the letter, Republican Representative Elise Stefanik, said, "Autel drones made in Communist China present an unacceptable national security risk and should not be allowed to operate in America."翻译:这封信的另一位签署人、共和党众议员埃莉斯·斯特凡尼克(Elise Stefanik)表示，“共产主义中国制造的Autel无人机构成了不可接受的国家安全风险，不应被允许在美国运营。”

The Commerce Department in 2020 imposed export restrictions on China-based drone manufacturer DJI, accusing it of complicity in the oppression of China's Uyghur minority and helping the military.翻译:美国商务部于 2020 年对中国无人机制造商大疆创新实施了出口限制，指责其共谋压迫中国维吾尔少数民族并帮助军方。

The lawmakers asked if Autel should face similar restrictions, citing concerns that Autel technology was used in Xinjiang, and said the company "further appears to be potentially supporting Russia’s ongoing invasion of Ukraine."翻译:立法者询问 Autel 是否应该面临类似的限制，理由是担心 Autel 技术在新疆使用，并表示该公司“似乎还可能支持俄罗斯持续入侵乌克兰”。

Gallagher and Krishnamoorthi earlier this month introduced legislation seeking to ban the U.S. government from buying any Chinese drones.翻译:加拉格尔和克里希纳莫提本月早些时候提出了立法，试图禁止美国政府购买任何中国无人机。

Congress in 2019 banned the Pentagon from buying or using drones and components manufactured in China.翻译:国会于2019年禁止五角大楼购买或使用中国制造的无人机及零部件。

The U.S. government has taken other actions to limit Chinese-made drone purchases.翻译:美国政府还采取了其他行动来限制购买中国制造的无人机。

The U.S. Interior Department in January 2020 said it was grounding its fleet of about 800 Chinese-made drones after halting additional purchases of such drones by the agency.翻译:美国内政部于 2020 年 1 月表示，在停止额外采购此类无人机后，将停飞由约 800 架中国制造的无人机组成的机队。

Over 50% of drones sold in the United States are made by DJI, and they are the most popular drones in use by public safety agencies, Republican lawmakers said earlier this year.翻译:共和党议员今年早些时候表示，美国销售的无人机中有超过 50% 由大疆创新制造，它们是公共安全机构最受欢迎的无人机。

Reporting by David Shepardson; Editing by Chris Reese and Mark Porter翻译:大卫·谢泼德森报道；克里斯·里斯和马克·波特编辑

item.title: JSW与中国上汽集团在印度成立新合资企业，致力于绿色出行
item.description:
Indian conglomerate JSW Group and China's SAIC Motor (600104.SS) have formed a joint venture in India with a focus on green mobility and to develop the electric vehicle ecosystem, the two companies said in a statement on Thursday.翻译:印度企业集团 JSW 集团和中国上汽集团（600104.SS）周四在一份声明中表示，两家公司已在印度成立一家合资企业，专注于绿色出行和开发电动汽车生态系统。

JSW will take a 35% stake in the new Indian joint venture, the companies said.翻译:两家公司表示，JSW 将持有新印度合资企业 35% 的股份。

SAIC already has a presence in India through its fully owned unit MG Motor India but has struggled to grow its presence in the country after Chinese investments faced increased scrutiny from New Delhi.翻译:上汽集团已经通过其全资子公司名爵汽车印度公司在印度开展业务，但在中国投资面临新德里更严格的审查后，上汽集团在印度的业务发展一直举步维艰。

The new joint venture with JSW will also support growth of SAIC's MG in India by increasing locally sourced auto parts, expanding the production capacity and growing its charging infrastructure, the companies said.翻译:两家公司表示，与 JSW 成立的新合资企业还将通过增加本地采购的汽车零部件、扩大产能和发展充电基础设施来支持上汽名爵在印度的发展。

Both partners "shall work closely" to create greener and smarter mobility products and services and achieve "greater success for MG in India", Wang Xiaoqiu, President of SAIC said in the statement.翻译:上汽集团总裁王晓秋在声明中表示，双方“将密切合作”，打造更绿色、更智能的出行产品和服务，并“为名爵在印度取得更大成功”。

MG entered India in 2019 with plans to invest about $650 million.翻译:MG于2019年进入印度，计划投资约6.5亿美元。

(This story has been corrected to clarify that JSW, SAIC are forming a new JV, and JSW is not taking a stake in SAIC-owned MG Motor India, in the headline and paragraph 1)翻译:（这篇报道已更正，以澄清标题和第 1 段中的 JSW 和 SAIC 正在组建一家新的合资企业，并且 JSW 并未持有 SAIC 旗下 MG Motor India 的股份）

item.title: 普华永道附属公司和中国公司因美国审计失败而支付 790 万美元
item.description:
PricewaterhouseCoopers affiliates in Hong Kong and China and a Chinese audit firm have agreed to pay a total of $7.9 million in fines for failures related to audits of U.S.-listed Chinese companies, the U.S. accounting watchdog said on Thursday.翻译:美国会计监管机构周四表示，普华永道在香港和中国大陆的分支机构以及一家中国审计公司已同意就在美国上市的中国公司的审计失败支付总计 790 万美元的罚款。

The penalties come over a year after Beijing and Washington struck a landmark deal that has allowed the U.S. Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB) to inspect the books and records of Chinese companies listed in New York for the first time. While the fines are relatively small, they are among the biggest the watchdog has ever issued and indicate that the inspection deal, a decade in the making, is working as hoped.翻译:一年多前，北京和华盛顿达成了一项具有里程碑意义的协议，允许美国上市公司会计监督委员会（PCAOB）首次检查在纽约上市的中国公司的账簿和记录。虽然罚款金额相对较小，但这是监管机构有史以来开出的最大罚款之一，这表明这项历时十年的检查协议正在按预期发挥作用。

" The days of China-based firms evading accountability are over. The PCAOB is demonstrating that we will take action to protect investors in U.S. markets and impose tough sanctions against anyone who violates PCAOB rules and standards, no matter where they are located," said PCAOB chair Erica Williams in a statement.翻译:“中国公司逃避责任的时代已经结束。PCAOB 正在表明，我们将采取行动保护美国市场的投资者，并对任何违反 PCAOB 规则和标准的人实施严厉制裁，无论他们身在何处。” PCAOB 主席艾丽卡·威廉姆斯 (Erica Williams) 在一份声明中表示。

PricewaterhouseCoopers firms in Hong Kong and China agreed to pay a total of $7 million for violating quality control standards after they failed to detect or prevent extensive answer-sharing on mandatory training courses, the PCAOB said.翻译:PCAOB 表示，普华永道在香港和中国大陆的公司因未能发现或阻止强制性培训课程中广泛的答案共享而同意支付总计 700 万美元的违反质量控制标准的费用。

"After becoming aware of these issues, the firms investigated these matters promptly and took remedial action," the PwC affiliates said in a joint statement, noting they reported the problems to the PCAOB.翻译:普华永道附属公司在一份联合声明中表示，“在意识到这些问题后，这些公司立即调查了这些问题并采取了补救措施”，并指出他们向 PCAOB 报告了这些问题。

The PCAOB also fined Shandong Haoxin Certified Public Accountants Co., Ltd. and four accountants $940,000 for violations including issuing a false audit report and failing to maintain independence from a public company client. The individuals are also facing industry bars of varying lengths, the PCAOB said.翻译:PCAOB 还对山东浩信会计师事务所有限公司和四名会计师处以 94 万美元的罚款，罪名包括发布虚假审计报告以及未能保持与上市公司客户的独立性。 PCAOB 表示，这些个人还面临着不同长度的行业限制。

Haoxin did not respond immediately to requests for comment.翻译:浩鑫没有立即回应置评请求。

The U.S. has for years worried that the auditors of U.S.-listed Chinese companies were falling down on the job, putting investors at risk. But Beijing had resisted allowing the PCAOB access to its auditors' records, citing state secrecy concerns.翻译:多年来，美国一直担心在美上市的中国公司的审计师失职，让投资者面临风险。但北京方面以国家保密问题为由，拒绝允许美国上市公司会计监管委员会查阅其审计师记录。

In August 2022, the two countries - spurred on by a new U.S. law that threatened to kick potentially 200 Chinese companies off U.S. exchanges - finally agreed a framework for beginning inspections of eight audits.翻译:2022 年 8 月，在美国一项新法律的推动下，该法律威胁要将 200 家中国公司踢出美国交易所，两国最终同意了开始对八项审计进行检查的框架。

In May, the PCAOB said it found a slew of deficiencies in audits of U.S.-listed Chinese companies performed by PwC in Hong Kong and KPMG. At the time, the watchdog said it was common to find issues when first accessing a country's auditors.翻译:今年5月，PCAOB 表示，普华永道香港分公司和毕马威会计师事务所对在美上市的中国公司进行的审计存在一系列缺陷。当时，监管机构表示，首次接触一个国家的审计师时发现问题是很常见的。

It did not disclose which companies' audits it had selected for inspection, but Reuters has previously reported that Alibaba Group Holding and Yum China Holdings were among them.翻译:该公司没有透露选择了哪些公司进行审计，但路透社此前曾报道称，阿里巴巴集团控股公司和百胜中国控股公司均在其中。

The PCAOB's inspection in the region continue and the regulator continues to have "complete access" in its inspections, Williams said on Thursday.翻译:威廉姆斯周四表示，PCAOB对该地区的检查仍在继续，监管机构在检查中继续拥有“完全权限”。

"American investors are better protected when the PCAOB can audit the auditors of issuers listed in the United States," U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission chair Gary Gensler said in a statement.翻译:美国证券交易委员会主席加里·根斯勒(Gary Gensler)在一份声明中表示：“当PCAOB能够对在美国上市的发行人的审计师进行审计时，美国投资者将得到更好的保护。”

Reporting by Chris Prentice; Editing by Michelle Price, Chizu Nomiyama and Nick Zieminski翻译:克里斯·普伦蒂斯报道；编辑：Michelle Price、Chizu Nomiyama 和 Nick Zieminski

item.title: 中国中金公司分析师被告知不要发表悲观观点，穿奢侈品——备忘录
item.description:
China International Capital Corp (CICC) (3908.HK), the country's third-largest investment bank by market value, has told analysts not to publish bearish views on China's economy or its financial markets, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.翻译:据路透社看到的一份内部备忘录，中国市值第三大投资银行中国国际金融公司（中金公司） （3908.HK）已告知分析师不要发表对中国经济或金融市场的悲观观点。

The memo, which was sent to the bank's research department, also told them to refrain from commenting on issues that are not in line with government policies.翻译:这份发送给该银行研究部门的备忘录还告诉他们不要对不符合政府政策的问题发表评论。

Additionally, staff at the state-owned investment bank have been asked to not wear luxury brands or disclose their pay. Employees should "make sure their family members adhere to social and ethical standards", the memo said.翻译:此外，这家国有投资银行的员工被要求不得穿着奢侈品牌或透露自己的薪酬。备忘录称，员工应“确保其家庭成员遵守社会和道德标准”。

CICC did not respond to Reuters' request for comments.翻译:中金公司没有回应路透社的置评请求。

Bloomberg first reported the memo on Thursday.翻译:彭博社周四首先报道了这份备忘录。

CICC, the most active Chinese investment bank in offshore dealmaking, also said in the memo that extra caution should be applied when dealing with overseas clients to avoid political and national security risks.翻译:离岸交易最活跃的中资投行中金公司也在备忘录中表示，在与海外客户打交道时应格外谨慎，以避免政治和国家安全风险。

While negative comments by market analysts and commentators in China have often been censored by authorities, the trend became more noticeable after China's economic growth began to weaken last year.翻译:尽管中国市场分析师和评论员的负面评论经常受到当局的审查， 但这种趋势在去年中国经济增长开始疲软后变得更加明显。

The central government has also widened crackdowns on corruption and used rhetoric that criticises the country's "financial elite" for leading "hedonistic" lifestyles - part of its "common prosperity" drive that began in 2021.翻译:中央政府还加大了对腐败的打击力度，并使用言论批评该国“金融精英”过着“享乐主义”的生活方式——这是2021年开始的“共同富裕”行动的一部分。

Chinese banks began giving verbal guidance as early as 2022, warning bankers to stop posting photos that depicted lavish lifestyles on social media.翻译:中国的银行早在2022年就开始发出口头指导，警告银行家停止在社交媒体上发布描绘奢华生活方式的照片。

Banks have also been forced to cut pay and perks for investment bankers, including compensation and budget reductions for travel and entertainment.翻译:银行还被迫削减投资银行家的薪酬和福利，包括旅行和娱乐方面的薪酬和预算削减。

Reuters reported in April that CICC slashed bankers' bonuses by as much as 40%.翻译:路透社4月份报道称，中金公司将银行家的奖金削减了40%之多。

item.title: 阿根廷即将上任的外长表示该国不会加入金砖国家集团
item.description:
Argentina's incoming Foreign Minister Diana Mondino says the country will not join the BRICS grouping of developing nations in a post on social media X on Thursday.翻译:阿根廷即将上任的外交部长戴安娜·蒙迪诺周四在社交媒体 X 上发帖表示，该国不会加入发展中国家的金砖国家集团。

Argentina was among six countries invited to become new members of the BRICS at a summit held in South Africa in August, part of the grouping's push to reshuffle a Western-dominated world order it sees as outdated.翻译:8月在南非举行的一次峰会上，阿根廷是受邀成为金砖国家新成员的六个国家之一，这是金砖国家推动重新洗牌其认为已经过时的西方主导世界秩序的一部分。

item.title: 习近平就基辛格逝世向拜登致唁电
item.description:
China's President Xi Jinping and senior Chinese officials have sent messages of condolence to U.S. President Joe Biden and others after the passing of veteran U.S. diplomat Henry Kissinger, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Thursday.翻译:中国外交部周四表示，在美国资深外交官亨利·基辛格去世后，中国国家主席习近平和中国高级官员已向美国总统乔·拜登等人致唁电。

Kissinger, who visited China more than 100 times and last met with Xi during a surprise trip to Beijing in July, died on Wednesday aged 100, prompting widespread mourning among ordinary Chinese people on social media.翻译:基辛格曾访问中国100多次，最后一次与习近平会面是在7月份出人意料的北京之行。基辛格于周三去世，享年100岁，引发了社交媒体上普通中国民众的广泛哀悼。

"Dr. Kissinger was a good old friend of the Chinese people. He is a pioneer and builder of Sino-U.S. relations," ministry spokesperson Wang Wenbin said at a regular news conference.翻译:外交部发言人汪文斌在例行记者会上表示，基辛格博士是中国人民的好老朋友，是中美关系的开拓者和建设者。

Kissinger made "historic" contributions to the normalisation of China-U.S. relations, and Chinese people will remember him for his "sincere devotion and important contribution", Wang added.翻译:王补充道，基辛格为中美关系正常化做出了“历史性”贡献，中国人民将铭记他的“真诚奉献和重要贡献”。

Chinese Premier Li Qiang and Foreign Minister Wang Yi also sent messages of condolence to Kissinger's family and U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken, respectively, Wang told the briefing.翻译:中国国务院总理李强、外交部长王毅也分别向基辛格家属和美国国务卿布林肯致唁电。

Kissinger believed China-U.S. relations are vital to the peace and prosperity of the two countries and the wider world, Wang Wenbin said.翻译:汪文斌表示，基辛格认为，中美关系对两国和世界的和平与繁荣至关重要。

"China and the U.S. should carry forward Kissinger's strategic vision, political courage and diplomatic wisdom... and promote the sound, stable and sustainable development of China-U.S. relations," he said.翻译:中美双方应弘扬基辛格的战略远见、政治勇气、外交智慧……推动中美关系健康稳定可持续发展。

Kissinger, who served as secretary of state and national security adviser in the administrations of Presidents Richard Nixon and Gerald Ford, first visited Beijing in 1971, paving the way for the U.S. diplomatic opening to China.翻译:基辛格曾在理查德·尼克松和杰拉尔德·福特总统的政府中担任国务卿和国家安全顾问，他于1971年首次访问北京，为美国对华外交开放铺平了道路。

His death was widely mourned by Chinese state media and social media users.翻译:中国官方媒体和社交媒体用户广泛哀悼他的去世。

"The overarching impression of Kissinger (in China) was that he was someone in America who understood the Chinese people," said Brian Wong, an assistant professor and geopolitical strategist at Hong Kong University.翻译:香港大学助理教授兼地缘政治战略家布莱恩·黄(Brian Wong)表示：“基辛格（在中国）的总体印象是，他是一位了解中国人民的美国人。”

Kissinger was seen as an outsider who understood China's need to transcend its self-imposed isolation in the 1960s and early 1970s, Wong said.翻译:黄说，基辛格被视为一个局外人，他理解中国需要超越 20 世纪 60 年代和 1970 年代初自我施加的孤立。

"So, in short, he was seen as someone who, crucially, stood for a 'China understander'."翻译:“因此，简而言之，最重要的是，他被视为‘中国理解者’的代表。”
